title: Search Result Clicked Event Data
description: Data payload for the search.result_clicked event. Fired when a user clicks on a search result.

query.description: The search query that produced the result.

resultId.description: The unique identifier of the clicked result.

resultName.description: The display name or title of the clicked result.

resultType.description: The type of result, e.g. product, article, page.

position.description: The 1-based position of the result in the search results list.
